modName: Barney One Eyed - A simple follower
summary: Adds a new Nord follower in the game/or 2 if you download them both.
descriptionHtml:
[COLOR=#632423][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=7] Barney One Eyed[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#632423][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4]"Once a bandit that raided caravans and villages, Deadly in close combat. Now helping out an old friend."[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#632423][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4]
[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#632423][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4]Barney had enough of his life as a bandit after his mates raped and killed women, he killed all his old bandit friends and ran off with some gold and iron armor. When he returned to skyrim he went back to the village he grew up in and settled there until the dragons came back. He didn't like the idea of sitting around when hundreds of people were getting killed by dragons, he will now help out anyone that asks him to come with him if they give him a good sword to slaughter his foes.[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#632423][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4]
[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#632423][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4]Barney wanders around Riverwood close to the place you can fast travel to, he has a set of iron armor and some potions, you can hire him for nothing. (If he doesn't put his armor on when he comes with you you need to remove a piece of his armor and then give it back to him) Give him a weapon of some sorts and slay people.[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR][COLOR=#632423][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4] [/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#632423][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4]
[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
[FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4][COLOR=#1f497d]Where did the idea come from? [/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4][COLOR=#9bbb59]Being bored made me create him.[/COLOR][/SIZE][/FONT]
[COLOR=#c0504d][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=7]Freja The Warrioress[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]

[COLOR=#c0504d][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4]"Freja The Warrioress a nord from Rorikstead now living in Whiterun willing to come with you."(Hangs out near the market in Whiterun) [/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
[COLOR=#c0504d][FONT=Arial Black][SIZE=4]
[/SIZE][/FONT][/COLOR]
author: Djyoeris

files.name: Freja The Warrioress - A simple follower
